entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Lansdowne House

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Periods of snow or rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
